title: 3 and Out -  OTA Chemistry, Aaron Donald Watch, Belichick OC Idiocy, Baker Market
itunes:title: 3 and Out -  OTA Chemistry, Aaron Donald Watch, Belichick OC Idiocy, Baker Market
description:
John explains how OTA’s help build team chemistry, why Kyler Murray should show up, if Aaron Donald and the Rams might be headed for a split over his next deal, why Bill Belichick’s refusal to name an OC makes zero sense, if Sam Darnold can revive his career with Ben McAdoo calling plays, if anyone believes in Baker, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. 

 Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
